---
title : "StreamPort dev"
output : html_document
---

Import reticulate to enable using python objects in R

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(reticulate)
```

Import python modules to be run in R environment

```{python}
from src.StreamPort.device.DeviceEngine import DeviceEngine
from src.StreamPort.device.DeviceAnalysis import DeviceAnalysis
dev = DeviceEngine(source = r'C:\Users\PC0118\Desktop\ExtractedSignals')
dev.print()
```

Now we can use the functions that belong to the python object py

```{r echo=FALSE}
analyses <- py$dev$find_analyses()
py$dev$add_analyses(analyses)
py$dev$print()
```

Plot analyses

```{r}
py$dev$plot_analyses()
```
